xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: help.tipsPanel.title=Tips help.tipsPanel.noTipMessage=No Tip available! help.tipsPanel.gettingStartedTip=If you're a new XWiki user, check out the [[Getting Started Guide>>http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/GettingStarted/]]. help.tipsPanel.jumpToPageTip=Jump to any page in the wiki with Ctrl+G or Meta+G.\nSee [[more shortcuts>>http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Features/KeyboardShortcuts]]. help.tipsPanel.improveXWikiTip=Did you know that you can improve XWiki? Take 5 minutes to [[fill this survey>>http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Survey/ProductFeedback]] and help this open source project! help.tipsPanel.breadcrumbsTip=You can click on the arrows next to the breadcrumb elements to quickly navigate to sibling and children pages. help.tipsPanel.advancedHiddenShortcutTip=Press the x+x+x+a key combo to toggle the [[Advanced mode>>http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/PageEditing#HSimpleandAdvancededitingmodes]] and x+x+x+h to toggle the display of [[hidden pages>>http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/PageEditing#HHidingPages]]. help.tipsPanel.linkAutocompleteWYSIWYGTip=When editing in WYSIWYG, type ##[## and then start typing letters to get suggestions for creating a link. help.macroList.title=Available Macros help.macroList.id=Id help.macroList.name=Name help.macroList.category=Category help.macroList.description=Description help.macroList.visibility=Visibility
